title: Email Address Schema
description: The Email Address Archetype - Essential properties that define an email address

_id.description: Unique identifier for this email address

created.description: Date and time the email address was created in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

updated.description: Date and time the email address was updated in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD
